# asyncio-aws-client-290657

AWS configuration utilities for Python applications.

## Installation

```bash
pip install asyncio-aws-client-290657
```

## Usage

```python
from asyncio_aws_client_290657 import get_config, get_client

# Get AWS configuration
config = get_config()

# Get S3 client
s3 = get_client('s3')
```
